testimonial.quote: Habfract took over 20 hours of weekly manual work from my marketing team in the first month. We're now focused on strategy, not spreadsheets.

tiers.name: System

faq.question: What is an agentic workflow?
faq.answer: An agentic workflow is a series of tasks carried out by one or more AI agents to achieve a specific goal. You can choose from our pre-built workflows (like 'Post daily on social media') or work with us to create a custom one for your unique needs.

faq.question: How does the 'human-in-the-loop' feature work?
faq.answer: You can set specific checkpoints within any workflow where an agent must pause and wait for your approval via the mobile app. This ensures you have final say on critical actions, like sending an important email or publishing content.

faq.question: Can I try Habfract's services before committing?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer a consultation to understand your needs and can set up a proof-of-concept workflow for qualified businesses to demonstrate the value before you subscribe to a plan.

faq.question: Is my company's data secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security protocols to ensure your data is encrypted and secure. We are committed to maintaining the privacy and integrity of your information. You own your data, always.
